PM-KISAN.description: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi for small/marginal farmers.

PMEGP.description: Prime Minister’s Employment Generation Programme for self-employment.

Ayushman Bharat.description: Health insurance scheme for economically vulnerable Indians.

PMAY-G.description: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Gramin for rural housing.

PMAY-U.description: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Urban for urban housing.

PM Ujjwala Yojana.description: Provides LPG connections to women from BPL households.

PM Mudra Yojana.description: Provides loans to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises.

Stand-Up India.description: Facilitates bank loans between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 crore to SC/ST and women entrepreneurs.

Atal Pension Yojana.description: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers.

PM Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana.description: Life insurance scheme for individuals aged 18 to 50.

PM Suraksha Bima Yojana.description: Accident insurance scheme for individuals aged 18 to 70.

Digital India.description: Campaign to ensure the Government's services are made available to citizens electronically.

Startup India.description: Initiative to build a strong ecosystem for nurturing innovation and startups.

Make in India.description: Initiative to encourage companies to manufacture in India.

Skill India.description: Campaign to train over 40 crore people in India in different skills by 2022.

Swachh Bharat Mission.description: Nationwide campaign for cleanliness and sanitation.

Beti Bachao Beti Padhao.description: Campaign to generate awareness and improve the efficiency of welfare services for girls.

National Rural Employment Guarantee Act.description: Provides at least 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to rural households.

Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Y.description: Skill training program for rural youth.

National Career Service.description: Provides a variety of employment-related services.

Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana.description: Skill certification scheme to enable youth to take up industry-relevant skill training.

Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana.description: Savings scheme for the girl child.

Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana.description: Financial inclusion program to expand affordable access to financial services.

Ujjwala 2.0.description: Provides deposit-free LPG connections to low-income families.
